info.name: Naked Security: autohide the menu & sidebar
info.description: Auto-hide the header and footer as icons top and bottom, and autohide the sidebar at the left edge of the screen. Optionally, remove the comments, ads, and/or social media buttons.
info.additionalInfo:
• The home page layout is unchanged. All other pages are styled.
  • Hover over a placeholder to restore the header, footer, or sidebar.
  • The placeholder icons are animated to make them easier to find.

options.label: Top of the screen (always in view and available)
Top of the page (scrolls out of view with the page)
Bottom of the screen (always in view and available)
Bottom of the page (scrolls out of view with the page)
No, thank you.
